showScoreExcerpt:
“By the time it reaches its happily-ever-after ending – the musical doesn’t pretend for a moment it won’t get there – ’Bad Cinderella’ leaves us both more or less satisfied and more or less disappointed.”

bwwExcerpt: What Bad Cinderella does have is an amusing enough premise, an appealing score of songs that please in the moment, a gorgeous set design, performers that give it their all, and just enough rousing, good-natured moments to hold onto hopes that Bad Cinderella will arrive somewhere transformative before Dorothy has to return to Kansas.
